name: sbn_schema
title: مستعمل حوا - Social Business Network
description: Complete schema for Mostamal Hawa platform: marketplace, services, knowledge/wiki, and social networking. Supports i18n with separate translation tables.

tables.name: sbn_user_role_assignments
tables.label: User Role Assignments
tables.comment: Many-to-many relationship between users and roles

tables.name: sbn_categories
tables.label: Categories
tables.comment: Hierarchical categories for products, services, and content

tables.name: sbn_wiki_articles
tables.label: Wiki/Knowledge Articles
tables.comment: Knowledge base articles with hierarchical structure

fields.name: post_type
fields.comment: text, image, video, link, poll, story, product_share, service_share, article_share

tables.name: sbn_comments
tables.label: Comments
tables.comment: Comments on posts, products, services, and articles

tables.name: sbn_reactions
tables.label: Reactions/Likes
tables.comment: Reactions to posts, comments, products, services, articles

tables.name: sbn_hashtag_usages
tables.label: Hashtag Usages
tables.comment: Many-to-many relationship between hashtags and content

tables.name: sbn_reviews
tables.label: Reviews/Ratings
tables.comment: Reviews for products, services, and users

fields.name: message_type
fields.comment: text, image, video, audio, file, location

fields.name: type
fields.comment: like, comment, follow, message, product_inquiry, service_booking, etc.

fields.name: target_type
fields.comment: user, post, product, service, article, comment

tables.name: sbn_transactions
tables.label: Transactions
tables.comment: Financial transactions for products and services
